questions.text: Who is announcing Dog River's hockey games this year?
questions.explanation:
Wanda.

	Everyone is gearing up for the new hockey season in Dog River including Wanda who decided to bring a megaphone to work to practice her announcing.  Brent and Hank try to play hockey outside the gas station, but have to stop when a car pulls up.

questions.text: What is the name of Dog River's hockey team?
questions.explanation:
The River Dogs.

	Hank goes to The Ruby and asks Lacey for chocolate milk rather than his usual coffee.  He says that he's getting prepared for hockey which begins that week.  Lacey, like most Canadians, also gets excited that hockey is returning.

Rocket.

	Rocket goes to The Ruby to talk to Brent about the hockey season and tries to persuade him to switch teams.  Brent is appalled that Rocket would even think that he would switch teams, but when Rocket tells him that he'll give Brent an unlimited bar tab, he begins listening.

questions.text: What is the name of the Stonewood hockey team?
questions.explanation:
The Saints.

	Rocket is a member of the Stonewood Saints.  Brent declines the offer to switch teams and Rocket says that he's making a bad decision.  He tells him to watch out, otherwise he'll be scored on every game.

questions.text: What does the Dog River team not use in their compensation offer to keep Brent?
questions.explanation:
A free coffee.

	The team fights to keep Brent and plans the compensation package before Brent even arrives at the meeting.  Although they planed this, they also argues for ten minutes about how much a hockey puck weighs.

questions.text: Oscar's car breaks down before the first hockey game.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Emma doubts that Oscar could fix the car because he never seems to know what he's doing, and before they leave the house, Emma threatens to throttle Oscar with an extension cord.  Oscar says that if the car starts, she has to shut up, and she agrees to it.  Luckily, the car does start, but they still don't get to see the game.

questions.text: What song did Wanda play when the Dog River team took to the ice last year?
options: Oh Where, Oh Where, Has My Little Dog Gone?
questions.explanation:
Who Let the Dogs Out?.

	When Brent tells Wanda to change the song "Who Let the Dogs Out?" (by the Baha Men), she ends up changing the song to the tune of "Jingle Bells" sung by a dog.  Everyone in the audience remains enthusiastic during the song, but both Hank and Brent are disappointed.

questions.text: Who helps Oscar and Emma get out of the car?
questions.explanation:
Karen.

	Although Emma and Oscar make it to the arena, they can't leave their car because the electric door lock won't budge.  While they try and open the door, Karen offers to break open the window, but they tell her to go and find something to jimmy open the door with.  Instead, Karen decides to go watch the hockey game.

questions.text: Who becomes Dog River's hockey coach?
questions.explanation:
Lacey.

	Rather than wait for the team to ask her to coach, Lacey eases herself in by performing a few little tasks.  Eventually, Lacey is giving them entire strategies.  When Wanda realizes that Lacey is coaching, she announces it, and the Dog River crowd gives a standing ovation.

questions.text: Does Dog River win the hockey game?
questions.explanation:
No.

	Dog River and Stonewood end up tying the game, and although Stonewood is depressed with the tie, Dog River is ecstatic.  Lacey is praised for coaching the team for a near-victory, and Oscar and Emma manage to get out of their car when Karen realizes that Oscar knocked one of the wires loose on the battery.
